basics.name: Rexter Delos Santos
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently working for the Department of Information Technology as a Computer Programmer II. In my spare time, I like to be with my family, learn new things about tech and build model kits.

work.summary: Summer internship with HEI to develop a web app to track carbon emission
highlights: Input travel data such as date, distance and type of vehicle
Track carbon emission that were created from travelling
Compare savings between travelling with gas vehicles versus alternative modes of transport such as cycling, bus, etc.

work.summary: ITS help desk for the University of Hawaii
highlights: Assist in helping users in resolving their issues with the University system (i.e. Laulima, STAR, etc.)
Quickly use problem solving skills to resolve the issue in a timely manner
Listen to the user's request and quickly process what it is they need
Assist in helping customers with what they need.
Work as a team to meet sales goals.

volunteer.summary: Created a web application that would showcase efforts made towards conservation goals
highlights: Upload their efforts towards an Aloha+ Challenge goal
Create events such as beach cleanups that others could sign up for

volunteer.summary: Assist the team in creating a robot for the FIRST Robotics Comptetition
highlights: Teach students about the electrical components of the robot as well as how to wire it.
Teach students C++ and Java programming

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
